body.name: Dirt Devil Multi-Surface Total Pet+ Upright Bagless Vacuum Cleaner, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 51 mins
features: MAXPOWER TECHNOLOGY: Maximum suction power for a faster, more efficient clean while preventing potential clogging
PET TOOL KIT: Eliminate pet hair around the home with the included versatile tools and extra reach
POWERPASS TECHNOLOGY: Reduces vacuuming time by helping prevent dirt and dust from scattering across hard floors
8FT. CLEANING REACH: Capture dust, debris and crumbs from all over with the extension wand and flexible hose
LARGE, EASY EMPTY DIRT CUP: Easily empty dirt and debris from the dirt cup with one touch of a button
body.description: Experience a high-performance clean on hard floors and carpets with the Dirt Devil Multi-Surface Total Pet+ upright vacuum. Use Max Power™ technology to capture large debris, fine particles and deeply embedded dirt. PowerPass™ technology reduces vacuuming time by preventing dust and dirt from scattering across hard floors. The versatile Pet Tool Kit is designed to help easily remove pet hair throughout the home using versatile tools and extra cleaning reach. The 4-level height adjustment helps to smoothly transition between varying floor types with the turn of a dial. The included 12" Extension Wand, 11" 2-in-1 Crevice/Dusting Brush, Pet Upholstery Tool and Turbo Tool™ help target messes for above-floor cleaning. With Click Lock™ tool security, tools are locked into place so they won't fall off and are easily accessible in the middle of cleaning. Once finished, easily empty the large dirt cup with a one-touch button.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CLEAN FASTER WITH MAX POWER TECHNOLOGY Get more suction and superior pick up in each pass.

POWERPASS TECHNOLOGY Reduces vacuuming time by helping prevent dirt and dust from scattering across hard floors. EXTENDED LIFE FILTRATION Get longer lasting powerful suction with the high-performance filtration system that helps reduce dirt and dust particles released back into the air. PET TOOL KIT Versatile tools designed to eliminate pet hair throughout your home. MAX POWER TECHNOLOGY Maximum suction provides a faster, more efficient clean while helping to prevent potential clogging.
IDEAL FOR PET OWNERS Included versatile tools help remove pet hair throughout your home. NO MESS IS OUT OF REACH Clean beyond the floor with 8 ft. cleaning reach and versatile attachments.

Less Hassle, More Cleaning Power We give dirt the one-two punch - Cleaning has never been so devilishly delightful thanks to thoughtfully designed products that deliver a straightforward and quality clean. Get the job done (without the elbow grease) so you can focus less on chores and more on literally anything else

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have only used it once so far, but I am impressed. Lightweight. Easy to put together, easy to use. Great suction, (I have a beagle who spreads beagle glitter everywhere), and this vacuum really did the job. I couldn't believe how much hair it sucked up out of the throw rugs. Good on hardwood floors too. My only complaint is that the hose isn't really long enough to reach ceilings. All in all a pretty good machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every dollar
reviews.reviewText: For the price this thing works legit, good quality and it feels nice when using it and also feels like you can almost run with it that’s how smooth the wheels are on this vacuum. I 100% recommend getting it if you need a budget vaccum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When you have dogs you need a vacuum that is going to pick up dog hair. This vacuum does that. It does well on hardwood flooring and carpeting. Only problem, when you go to hardwood to carpet you have to switch it over. To me it’s a pain. The cord is a good size. This vacuum is loud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dog hair!
reviews.reviewText: This is my second purchase of this item. We have a three story house. I bought this one for the downstairs about a year ago and have loved it so much that I'm buying one for upstairs. My dog's shedding has killed FOUR higher-end, cordless uprights in two years. They get clogged quickly, which is a drag on the batteries and they also lose suction. Plus they're a pita to clean because of the way the cup detaches. I always got my hands covered in dust trying to empty them. This one empties clean & easy. No hands required.It is a full-size corded vac, so it's not as sleek and easy to maneuver as the cordless ones we used to have. However, the cord is super long so I'm not constantly having to change plugs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It sucks like a Vacuum should!
reviews.reviewText: Great vacuum for the price and it does have good suction.Like a vacuum is supposed too.5 star

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It fails quickly
reviews.reviewText: The product failed the fourth time I used it. I am trying to return it. No one will provide a box within which to return it. The manufacturer will not send a replacement until it receives this failed product back, but refuses to provide a box to ship it back. Very disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great 👍 simple strong function
reviews.reviewText: Much better than Bissell that fell apart scooping dust and rabbit 🐇 pellets. Sharp vacuum blew up because I hit wet carpet by accident. This vacuum does the job without a bunch of fancy useless 💩.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's all about the little things.
reviews.reviewText: I've used Bissell products my past three vacuums but decided to give Dirt Devil a try because my daughter seems to like hers.Pros:- Its light, maneuverable, and really sucks…almost too it's detriment. It's been really hard on my area carpets.- Its inexpensive.Cons:- It feels like a toy compared to the Bissell vacuums I've owned in the past; I don't expect it to last for too many years.- It has no rubber bumpers to protect furniture and walls. Just hard plastic baby!- It has locking attachments and hose connections that are uniquely sized so you're unable to use off-brand, friction fit attachments. Locking attachments on any vacuum make no sense to me because the very nature of a vacuum holds the pieces together.- The vacuum head has no mid-way locking position so when the head is unlocked with the foot peddle the handle will fall to the ground. It's great for vacuuming under a bed but it makes it difficult to get over the edge of an area rug/carpet. You either have to bend to the ground to get the vacuum head to lift off the floor to get it onto the carpet/rug or pick up the whole vacuum to place it on top. Either way it's good exercise!In the end it's a good vacuum for the price, but I'll most likely go back to Bissell the next time around.
La base du bas est grosse et epaisse et donc impossible de faire dessous de meubles ou coins. Peu maniable. Il faut uitiliser le tuyau et installer les pieces. Trop complexe je renvois sans l essayer
